page.title: 12Feast Week at Cottesmore
page.content: One day in July it was the first day of Feast Week.In Feast Week we liked the roller disco best.At nine o/clock I had to phone my dad up because my legs were aching.I went home at ten o/clock and my friend Lucy came with me.Then I went straight to bed.On Monday there was bingo and Mrs Frere organised it in the village hall. On Wednesday there was a whist drive which is a game of cards.The Fun Run was held at our village hall and we had to run round and round the hall.The first person out of the children was Nicola,she won a can of Coke and four Marathon chocolate bars. Out of the grown-ups the winner was Windy.He won a trophy.We have 5-a-Side Football and Skittles on the green every night.
